  16. ‌#define CAML_INTERNALS

  18. /* To walk the memory roots for garbage collection */

  20. #include "caml/finalise.h"
  21. #include "caml/globroots.h"
  22. #include "caml/major_gc.h"
  23. #include "caml/memory.h"
  24. #include "caml/minor_gc.h"
  25. #include "caml/misc.h"
  26. #include "caml/mlvalues.h"

  28. #include "caml/major_gc.h"
  29. #include "caml/shared_heap.h"
  30. #include "caml/fiber.h"

  32. ‌CAMLexport _Atomic scan_roots_hook caml_scan_roots_hook =
  33.   (scan_roots_hook)NULL;

  35. ‌void caml_do_roots (
  36.   scanning_action f, scanning_action_flags fflags, void* fdata,
  37.   caml_domain_state* d,
  38.   int do_final_val)
  39. {
  40.   scan_roots_hook hook;
  41.   caml_do_local_roots(f, fflags, fdata,
  42.                       d->local_roots, d->current_stack, d->gc_regs);
  43.   hook = atomic_load(&caml_scan_roots_hook);
  44.   if (hook != NULL) (*hook)(f, fflags, fdata, d);
  45.   caml_final_do_roots(f, fflags, fdata, d, do_final_val);

  47. }

  49. ‌CAMLexport void caml_do_local_roots (
  50.   scanning_action f, scanning_action_flags fflags, void* fdata,
  51.   struct caml__roots_block *local_roots,
  52.   struct stack_info *current_stack,
  53.   value * v_gc_regs)
  54. {
  55.   struct caml__roots_block *lr;
  56.   int i, j;
  57.   value* sp;

  59.   for (lr = local_roots; lr != NULL; lr = lr->next) {
  60.     for (i = 0; i < lr->ntables; i++){
  61.       for (j = 0; j < lr->nitems; j++){
  62.         sp = &(lr->tables[i][j]);
  63.         if (*sp != 0) {
  64.           f (fdata, *sp, sp);
  65.         }
  66.       }
  67.     }
  68.   }
  69.   caml_scan_stack(f, fflags, fdata, current_stack, v_gc_regs);
  70. }
